definition: (jocularly) Valentine's Day, referring to the rising number of extramarrital affairs being discovered on that day
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
double seven festival, evening of seventh of lunar seventh month/girls' festival/Chinese Valentine's day, when Cowherd and Weaving maid 牛郎織女|牛郎织女 are allowed their annual meeting
variable glycine (Glycine tabacina), a scrambling plant in the bean family
(slang) to pick up girls/to chase after girls
(slang) to stick sth up the anus/to have anal intercourse
the bleating of sheep/final particle which transforms statements into questions that indicate doubt or surprise (Cantonese)
"break-up agent", person who acts for sb who wishes to terminate a relationship but does not have the heart to do so
